csl:
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
    class="in-text"
    xml:lang="en"
    version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id></id>
    <title></title>
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>


    <macro name="title">
       <text variable="title" quotes="true" suffix=","/>
    </macro>

    <citation>
        <layout>
            <text value="Ignore me"/>
        </layout>
    </citation>

    <bibliography>
        <layout>
            <text macro="title"/>
        </layout>        
    </bibliography>

</style>
